data.title: North Carolina Council on Developmental Disabilities Homepage
data.meta_description: The North Carolina Council on Developmental Disabilities (NCCDD) is committed to promoting self-determination, independence, productivity and inclusion in all areas of community life and assuring people with intellectual and developmental disabilities (I/DD) and their families participate in the design of and have access to needed community services and individualized supports.
